task.title: Using the StellarOne Command Line Interface (CLI)

context.p: command line interfaceBelow section describes how to log on StellarOne and get a list of available commands via command line interface (CLI).

step.cmd: Log on by tying root as the user name, txone as the password.

note.p: If the StellarOne instance is deployed from AMI on AWS EC2 platform, type admin as the user name and no password is needed.

step.cmd: After logging on the StellarOne console, type help command for a list of available commands.
